main.title: Coding everywhere
main.body:
Hello, I'm Felipe Gibran.
This is my space where I share my work with everyone. Be my guest.

about_me.title: Who I am
about_me.body: I'm a fullstack web software engineer with 5+ years of experience. I've been working with several technologies that brought me the ability to solve problems and develop many types of applications. My responsibility is to show the best solution for clients. As a result, they will have a top quality application with the lowest operating and maintenance costs.

feature.title: What I can bring for your application

items.name: technology
items.title: Ultimate Technology Tools
items.description: Your application will be up to date with the best technologies and services available today.

items.name: code
items.title: Clean & Structured code
items.description: An organized code base is better for maintenance and third-party implementations.

items.name: automation
items.title: Automation and Customization
items.description: The sky is the limit. Determine how automated and customizable your application is, based on your budget.

items.name: security
items.title: Security
items.description: Safety above all. All security standards will be applied to your application.

items.name: responsiveness
items.title: Multi-platform (responsiveness)
items.description: 80% of users prefer to browse the web on smartphones rather than computers.

items.name: ux
items.title: Highest User Experience (UX)
items.description: The best experience that users can ever have. Engaged users mean a better return rate.

items.name: fastness
items.title: Fastness
items.description: Time is money. Good performance is paramount to keep the users active.

items.name: seo
items.title: SEO patterns
items.description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) makes your application easy to be found by new users.

items.name: ndapp
items.title: NDapp
items.description:
Get news, information, and data on all of the latest decentralized applications built using the Neo blockchain.

I worked as: Desenvolvedor Fullstack

Year: 2021

items.name: wow
items.title: WOW Talent
items.description:
Press Play and meet WOW Ambassadors. Even though they are young, each one of them has been treading their own path of professional success, with experiences and achievements that are a reference for the Talents who are starting the same journey. Meet all our ambassadors. Be part of it!

I worked as: Fullstack Developer

Year: 2021

Sharity is the easiest and most efficient online crowdfunding platform for you to create campaigns and raise money for the causes and people you care about. Enter and discover it!

items.name: illsim
items.title: Illness Simulator
items.description:
Welcome to Illsim! This is a college project developed in 2017 that studies the behavior of a virus spreading around a population. This study explores the best vaccination strategies as the virus spreads.

I worked as: Frontend Developer
